item.description:
Sorry for the (relatively) short notice, but I've got exciting news! Our speaker will be Marilyn Santiesteban, who is a terrific consultant for career changers and job hunters. Marilyn has more than 20 years' experience as a management consultant, and is a real pro at helping people recognize and promote their potential!

Marilyn will be talking with us about how to create your own "brand". We all need to stand out in the crowd -- she can help us learn how! Marilyn writes a terrific blog, btw, which I highly recommend: http://twitter.com/la...

The fee is $5.00. Please pay ahead (on the web site). If you cannot do this, let me know. I'm OK with accepting money at the meeting, but I hate to spend precious meeting time hitting people up for their $5.00! Thanks....

There will definitely be a raffle, and anyway...this is a NETWORKING meeting, ladies! Please bring business cards!!

If the change in day is a problem for anyone, please let me know.

Cheers, Karen
617-650-8716
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.name: Moving on? You need a "brand"!
